A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie does have a few flaws. But\, overall I liked it. It subverts your expectations. I believe this was important if Star Wars is going to remain relevant for years to come. I liked Force Awakens\, it quenched my nostalgia. I liked Last Jedi because it truly has me curious what they will do for a finale\, instead of a rehash of Return of The Jedi. Also\, it teaches one of Yoda’s lessons to all characters\, “the greatest teacher\, failure is”.
